title: Fail to download most recent replay.
body: It is failing to download my most recent replay. I can download all of the games prior. I am running in admin mode as well. I just dont have access to the most recent one for some reason.

replies.body: Running as admin was a solid step, because it does sound like some security setting might be blocking the client from saving your replays.  Replays are still in testing, so I suggest reporting this over to our client devs through the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  In the meantime, see if the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide could restore access.  Thanks for the find!
